meanings.definition: The quality of being efficient and prompt in action or performance.
meanings.sent1: Her expeditiousnesses in completing tasks impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: The expeditiousnesses of the delivery service saved us a lot of time.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's expeditiousnesses in gathering nuts put the other animals to shame.
meanings.sent4: The expeditiousnesses of the cheetah made it the fastest animal in the jungle.
meanings.sent5: His expeditiousnesses in solving puzzles astounded everyone around him.

meanings.definition: The act of accomplishing something quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent1: The team's expeditiousnesses in finishing the project ahead of schedule was commendable.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the expeditiousnesses with which you responded to my request.
meanings.sent3: The expeditiousnesses of the chef in preparing the meal left the guests amazed.
meanings.sent4: The expeditiousnesses of the river carving through the rock over centuries is a marvel of nature.
meanings.sent5: The expeditiousnesses of the bee pollinating flowers is crucial for plant reproduction.
